text: Hey, is that bicycle outside the office yours? Do you enjoy cycling? I do I've liked riding my bike since my childhood. It's not just a hobby. It's a way of life for me. That's great How long have you been into cycling? I've been a cyclist for more than 15 years It's a love that hasn't disappeared with time. Wow, and what kind of cycling do you enjoy the most? I love road cycling and the feeling of the open road. It's a great way to stay fit and explore new places That's fantastic. I want to get into cycling too. I haven't been on a bike since I was a kid I probably even forgot how to do it people say we never forget say do you still have a bike? Would you like to go cycling with me one of these days? Sure. I'd love to let's see what we can do next week Okay, it's a bike date then

dialogue.text: Hey, is that bicycle outside the office yours? Do you enjoy cycling?
I do I've liked riding my bike since my childhood. It's not just a hobby. It's a way of life for me. That's great
How long have you been into cycling? I've been a cyclist for more than 15 years
It's a love that hasn't disappeared with time. Wow, and what kind of cycling do you enjoy the most?
I love road cycling and the feeling of the open road. It's a great way to stay fit and explore new places
That's fantastic. I want to get into cycling too. I haven't been on a bike since I was a kid
I probably even forgot how to do it people say we never forget say do you still have a bike?
Would you like to go cycling with me one of these days? Sure. I'd love to let's see what we can do next week
Okay, it's a bike date then
